title: new patch not updating???
body: for some reason I've tried all the support options to fix my game so the new patch will update and after a good hour i got to 4% and then the update failed...is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Rineyy has provided some solid guides to troubleshoot this.  Something may be blocking the patcher from scanning your files, and the permissions guide could fix this up.  If you continue to experience issues, reach out to our tech team through a [player support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
thank you i got it to work

This could stem from a series of issues.

Firstly, restart your computer and attempt to launch again. If you receive the same error;

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)
